dict.string: New data will be pushed to your iPad from the server when possible.
New data will be pushed to your iPhone from the server when possible.
New data will be pushed to your iPhone Simulator from the server when possible.
New data will be pushed to your iPod from the server when possible.
If Manual is selected, this account will only check for updates when the application is in use.
The schedule below is used when push is off or for applications which do not support push. For better battery life, fetch less frequently.
If Push is not available, the Fetch schedule will be used.
